title: Who has the longest hook/grab?
body: This is only between Blitz, Thresh, and Naut. Please tell me who has the longest grab, I'd say {{champion:111}} .. u?

replies.body: Consider Thresh's q has a *windup* cast time, meaning not only is the travel speed less then Naut's, Thresh also has to waste time winding up his q. Also, I do believe Naut's q's hitbox actually extends *further* then the range indicator. Thresh's q cc's the target for longer then Blitz or Naut's, and Blitz's is the "safest" to use, both because of the mechanics of how Blitz's q work and the rest of his kit (knock up, silence)

Blitz:
RANGE: 925
SPEED: 1750

Thresh:
RANGE: 1100
SPEED: 1900

Naut:
RANGE: 1100
SPEED: 2000

Pudge.

The answer is always Pudge.
